page.title: 08BREAN SANDS HOLIDAY CAMP (1)
page.content: The holiday camp at Brean sands covers quite a large area.It is a self catering holiday centre with the attraction of entertainment on the doorstep.All the leisure facilities and night life are included in the cost of the holiday and once you've paid,your entertainment and activities are free. The majority of people we spoke with said the entertainment was of very high standard and this wasn't their first holiday in the village. The variety of entertainment includes late night disco's,cabaret,bar and ballroom dancing.They are all well supervised.A disabled man we spoke to told us that the facilities for disabled were quite good but there was no entrance to the pool for the elderly and he complained about the noise of the music.The facilities include a heated pool.Continued on page 2
